TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PrincipalExistsException extends System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalException

Docs.summary: Thrown by <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalCollection.Add> when an attempt is made to insert a principal that already exists in the collection, or by when an attempt is made to save a new principal that already exists in the store.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException> class. The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error. This message takes into account the current system culture. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property is initialized to `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The text of the error message.
Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo info, valuetype System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: A that contains the information required to serialize the new
A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> instances.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string message, class System.Exception innerException) cil managed

Docs.param: The text of the error message.
Docs.summary: Instantiates a new instance of the class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalExistsException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`. If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message. The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> is initialized to `null`.
